Scroll Snap Align

# Scroll Snap Align

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class                   | Support     |
| ----------------------- | ----------- |
| ```
snap-start
```      | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
snap-end
```        | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
snap-center
```     | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
snap-align-none
``` | 🌐 Web only |
